actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations of certain potential water resource developments.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations of potential water resource developments in the Yakima project near the Yakima River in the State of Washington.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations of certain potential water resource developments.
